description: The project enables the development of a framework to guide the coordination & implementation of climate change adaptation initiatives.

subproject.description: Through the project, a countrywide framework will be developed that encompasses the immediate and urgent adaptation activities. The framework would  address the current and anticipated adverse effects of climate change, including extreme events.
subproject.title: Vanuatu NAPA

title: Vanuatu National Adaptation Programme of Action (NAPA)
